text: Getting It Right is a 1989 British American comedy drama movie directed by Randal Kleiser and starring Jesse Birdsall, Jane Horrocks, Helena Bonham Carter, Pat Heywood, Lynn Redgrave, John Gielgud, Peter Cook, Ian Redford, Shirley Anne Field. ==Other websites== * Category:1989 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Randal Kleiser
title: Getting It Right
